title: Era of Doom Gaming suchen Spieler(Plat+/EuW/ENG)
body:
Hey fellow Summoners,
my name is Tommy, i am from germany and i want create a international ranked team whos is looking forward to win some tournaments and climbing the elo ladder.

I'm searching for an Botlane, Toplane and Jungle...
you should have reached platin and have experience in your lane!

I'm also searching for an Coach/Analyst who is getting paided by the team! (yes me too)
I dont wanna prepay you but i will pay you if i see its helping us and you are not just an normal guy who tells me everything that i already know.

If you have interest just add me
EoD Tommy
